title: DYK Marvelous Represent
text: Yo' back in the day......
When the tunes were soft an 'de makin' U sway...
Bak an forth to a yo yo beat wi'da moves and grooves de'll did it sweet!
Whatever crew who sang an played bu' ...can't find the video!
Vanish'd away like yesterday da....."Who" group dat no one knows!
Vh1 an da MTV de ........show up dead eulogies!!
Old dudes all gone away!
We got da right stuff hey!
Marvelous Family here now!
Rappin' Ur dirge so fear now!
Hear da buzzin' buzz da bee hive honey buzz:
No where ta run an der no where ta hide!!!
We got your number We're da Space Invaders!!
See U blunder..yo' 6 feet under.....
U where da sun don't shine we build U a shrine it's so fine!
Give it up! Break It Down!
You ain't got no game!!!
Even wi da moves U know U ain't de same!
Scorpia can say "All U Bro's E-Z-P-K" AYO
FYI we're here ta stay!
Yo! I gotta say..
All da gigs a yesteryear layin in graves
80/90 years is gone like de Pac Man , Pong and da Donkey Kong
Whatever trick U thank U tough U'll ...eat dust an dat's enuff!
Scorpia say U fade away so...watch out don't call our bluff
Vh1 an da MTV de ........show up dead eulogies!
Old dudes all gone away!
We got da right stuff hey!
Marvelous Family here now!
Rappin' Ur dirge so fear now!
Hear da buzzin' buzz da bee hive honey buzz:
No where ta run an der no where ta hide!!!
We got your number We're da Space Invaders!!
See U blunder..yo' 6 feet under.....
U where da sun don't shine we build U a shrine it's so fine!
So many gangs an crews out dere try-in to make it..
De sweat an strain ev-er-y-day so de can take it....
Move all da obstacles out-a der way to show up
Hopin' da world will see for dem de can "give it up"
We ain't no diff-er-ent we want all we can get now!
Movin' on stage beneath de lights we're takin' our bows...
So many groups out der are hopin' de can take our place....
Don't be decieved, yo jus' believe we're goin up!
